attributes.action: to prohibit the adoption of babies and young children by homosexual couples and to allow Christian Adoption agencies to state who they will allow to adopt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=adopt
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
